mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, name, password, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{name}, #{password},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM learning_data WHERE id=#{id} AND delete_date IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO learning_data(name, study_time, month, category_id, user_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{study_time}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{category_id}, #{user_id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT date_format(month,'%m') AS month,category_id,SUM(study_time) AS study_time FROM learning_data WHERE date_format(month,'%m') in ('04','05', '06') GROUP BY category_id, date_format(month,'%m') ORDER BY category_id;
